homework5

Class CosineSimilarity

  • java.lang.Object
    • homework5.CosineSimilarity

  • public class CosineSimilarity
extends java.lang.Object
    This class Calculates the cosine similarity between 2 words. Consists of methods that find the synonym of a word from a list of possible synonyms, if that is possible according to the semantic descriptor vectors of said word and possible synonyms.
    Author:
    Stavroulla Koumou

      Calculates the cosine similarity between 2 words.
      private static double getRootOfSumOfSquares(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> vector)
      Calculates the square root of the sum of squares of the passed vector's coordinates.
      static java.lang.String most_similar_word(java.lang.String word, java.lang.String[] choices, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> semaDesc)
      Takes a word and a list of possible synonyms, and finds the synonym from that list, if that is possible.

      • most_similar_word

        public static java.lang.String most_similar_word(java.lang.String word,
                                                 java.lang.String[] choices,
                                                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> semaDesc)
        Takes a word and a list of possible synonyms, and finds the synonym from that list, if that is possible.
        Parameters:
        word - the word;
        choices - the possible synonyms;
        semaDesc - the semantic descriptor vectors all the words known to the program;
        Returns:
        the synonym, or a suitable message if the synonym could not be found.;

      • cosine_Similarity

        private static double cosine_Similarity(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> vector1,
                                        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> vector2)
        Calculates the cosine similarity between 2 words.
        Parameters:
        vector1 - first word's semantic descriptor vector;
        vector2 - second word's semantic descriptor vector;
        Returns:
        a double number that expresses the similarity, or -1 if the similarity cannot be calculated;

        private static double getRootOfSumOfSquares(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> vector)
        Calculates the square root of the sum of squares of the passed vector's coordinates.
        Parameters:
        vector - a semantic descriptor vector;
        Returns:
        the root of sum of squares;
